summary: An in-depth examination of the culture and fashion of the sneaker, from its creation as athletic wear to its place as a cornerstone in hip-hop fashion.
cast: Bill Adler|Damon Dash|Doze|Missy Elliott|Futura 2000|Bobbito Garcia|Grandmaster Caz|Adam Horovitz|Rodd Houston|Mathieu Kassovitz|Bonz Malone|Darryl McDaniels|Raekwon|Koe Rodriguez
director: Directors: Thibaut de Longeville, Lisa Leone
title: Just for Kicks
